word:
This is a work to be done. There is need for Elder Ballenger to humble his soul before God and to refuse to receive new interpretations of the Scriptures. We have had to meet many men who have come with just such interpretations, seeking to establish false theories and unsettling the minds 


                                                                     page 16 

of many by their readiness to talk, and by their great array of texts which they have misapplied to suit their own ideas.
